feed.title: GhostFile Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for GhostFile: Some improved messaging and a binary!
entry.content: Added some improved messaging but also realized this tool would be ideal as a simple commandline tool!

entry.title: New release for GhostFile: ADDED GUI!!
entry.content:
This release adds a simple GUI to ghostfile. It is also no packaged as a .deb file. On a debian based system, one can simply install the deb file to have a clickable ghostfile icon or access it from the terminal as before. All command line options are still valid.

Ghostfile can work with or without a GUI!!!
